title: 05/19/21 DPS Hour 1 Tim Legler
itunes:title: 05/19/21 DPS Hour 1 Tim Legler
description:
Tim Legler tells Dan that it helps a shooter to know that there is no such thing as a bad shot. Tim says that the Clippers probably did try to dodge the Lakers and he does not blame them; but Tim ask what message did they send to the team?
